casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Damon Enrico THOMAS. No. 22P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Daniel F. Read, Durham, for Thomas. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of March 2008 by State of NC to Deem Response to Petition for Discretionary Review Timely Filed:

*391"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
